sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个词均有"金的"之意。
means: gold ： 指真金制造的东西，侧重指材料，但有时也作"金色的"解。
golden ： 指镀金的或金色的，多用于比喻。

sentence.Network_en: Imagine long golden beaches where you can wander in solitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 想象一下那长长的金色海滩吧，在那里你可以独自徜徉。

sentence.Network_en: First-generation Americans view the United States as a land of golden opportunity.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一代美国人认为美国是一个充满了机遇的国度。

sentence.Network_en: If you remember these three golden rules you won't go far wrong.
sentence.Network_cn: 记住这三条金律，就不会错到哪儿。

encyclopedia.content: 简介 1.音乐组合goldEN 唱作组合goldEN 成立於2008年，现属于金牌大风成员。由Cousin Fung（冯家俊）和Kenneth Lau（刘浩刚）组成，包办作曲编曲和演绎。 歌曲以合唱及和唱形式演出，在二人各有特色的声线和演绎风格下，擦出奇妙而有趣的音乐火花。 Cousin Fung:创作歌手，早在2003（16岁）及2006（19岁）制作个人全唱作专辑。 曾夺得多个区际歌唱比赛冠军（包括2005第十九届葵青区新秀歌唱大赛冠军、及2006中西区歌唱大赛合唱冠

entry.def: Something that is golden is bright yellow in colour.

example.ex: She combed and arranged her golden hair.

entry.def: Golden things are made of gold.

example.ex: ...a golden chain with a golden locket.
example.tran: 带有金制盒式链坠的金项链

entry.tran: 极好的；有发展前途的；有益的
entry.def: If you describe something as golden, you mean it is wonderful because it is likely to be successful and rewarding, or because it is the best of its kind.

example.ex: He says there's a golden opportunity for peace which must be seized.
example.tran: 他说务必抓住这个谋求和平的绝佳机会。

entry.tran: 大受欢迎（或十分成功）的人
entry.def: If you refer to a man as a golden boy or a woman as a golden girl, you mean that they are especially popular and successful.

example.ex: When the movie came out the critics went wild, hailing Tarantino as the golden boy of the 1990s.
example.tran: 这部影片上映后，批评家们反响十分热烈，他们将塔拉蒂诺誉为20世纪90年代的金牌男星。

means.word_mean: 1. having the deep slightly brownish color of gold;

sentences.sentence: "the halcyon days of the clipper trade"

means.word_mean: 3. made from or covered with gold;

sentences.sentence: "golden lads and girls all must / like chimney sweepers come to dust"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

Sentence.sentence: After reading a book on how to address for success, he had purchased an expensive dark navy suit and golden tie.
Why did Larry purchase an expensive navy suit and golden tie

sentences.en: The room was flooded with warm and golden sunlight.
sentences.cn: 房间充满着温暖、金色的阳光。

sentences.en: A vast expanse of golden crops lay before us.
sentences.cn: 我们眼前展现出一大片金黄色的庄稼。

sentences.en: We feel sure your future here is golden.
sentences.cn: 我们确信你在这儿前途似锦。

means.word_mean: 极好的, 非常有利的

sentences.en: I missed a golden chance to make a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 我失去了一个赚大钱的好机会。

jushi.english: All his attention was fixed on this golden prospect.
jushi.chinese: 他全神注视着这片金黄色的景色。

jushi.english: A soft breeze kissed the golden wheat in the fields.
jushi.chinese: 和风轻拂着田间金色的小麦。

jushi.english: The room was flooded with warm and golden sunlight.
jushi.chinese: 房间里充溢着温暖、金色的阳光。
